trans-unit.source: Provides a type converter that retrieves a list of control IDs in the current container.
trans-unit.target: 提供類型轉換器，擷取控制項中目前的容器識別碼的清單。

trans-unit.source: The AsyncPostBackTriggerControlIDConverter class derives from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.StringConverter> class and provides a list of control IDs for display in a property grid control in design-time environments.
trans-unit.target: AsyncPostBackTriggerControlIDConverter 類別衍生自<xref:System.ComponentModel.StringConverter>類別，並提供在設計階段環境中的屬性方格控制項中顯示的控制項 Id 的清單。</xref:System.ComponentModel.StringConverter>

trans-unit.source: For more information about type converters, see [How to: Implement a Type Converter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Generalized Type Conversion](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需型別轉換子的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to︰ 實作型別轉換子](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[一般化類型轉換](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.AsyncPostBackTriggerControlIDConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.AsyncPostBackTriggerControlIDConverter"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of control IDs from the container in the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> object when provided with a format context.
trans-unit.target: 傳回集合的控制項的容器中的 Id <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"> </xref>物件時提供格式內容。

trans-unit.source: An object that provides a format context that can be used to extract additional information about the environment from which this converter is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供格式內容，可用來擷取要從中叫用這個轉換子的環境的其他資訊。

trans-unit.source: This parameter, or properties of this parameter, can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數或此參數的屬性可以是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An object that holds a set of strings that represent the control IDs of the controls in the current container.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含一組字串，表示控制項中目前的容器控制項的 Id。

trans-unit.source: If the container has no controls, returns an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果容器沒有任何控制項，會傳回空集合。

trans-unit.source: If the context is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or if there is no current container, returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果內容是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>或如果沒有目前容器中，傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the collection of standard values that is returned from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.AsyncPostBackTriggerControlIDConverter.GetStandardValues*> method is an exclusive list of possible values, by using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出集合的標準值是否會傳回從<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.AsyncPostBackTriggerControlIDConverter.GetStandardValues*>方法使用指定的內容是可能的值的獨占清單。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.AsyncPostBackTriggerControlIDConverter.GetStandardValues*>

trans-unit.source: An object that provides a format context.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> object that is returned from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.AsyncPostBackTriggerControlIDConverter.GetStandardValues*> method provides an exhaustive list of possible values; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if other values are possible.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果從<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.AsyncPostBackTriggerControlIDConverter.GetStandardValues*>方法傳回的<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>物件提供可能的值的獨占清單<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果其他的值為可能。 </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.AsyncPostBackTriggerControlIDConverter.GetStandardValues*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this converter supports a standard set of control IDs that can be picked from a list, by using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出這個轉換器是否支援一組標準的控制項可以使用指定的內容中，從清單選取的 Id。

trans-unit.source: An object that provides a format context.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.AsyncPostBackTriggerControlIDConverter.GetStandardValues*> method should be called to find a common set of control IDs that the object supports; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.AsyncPostBackTriggerControlIDConverter.GetStandardValues*>方法應該呼叫以尋找一組常用的控制項 Id 物件支援; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.AsyncPostBackTriggerControlIDConverter.GetStandardValues*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。
